document.title: Faith Formation (Religion) Curriculum Framework Standards and Benchmarks: Grade 2

CB2A22EA7DD94E05AE31F2857C1AB1BE.description: Students will know the meaning of stewardship.

85FB98C70DC74C4A9BDF3964F022773C.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the importance of care for God’s creation.

7CC53ADF23ED4E30B2FB1596D577781B.description: Students will know that the Eucharist unites us with the living and the communion of saints.

5CD58087AF26418DA62EBF875F5D1E59.description: Students will grow in their understanding of solidarity.

667719BC07294586A9578EE395A3306E.description: Students will know that they must respect themselves.

A8057C6EEC3444F4A49D6B1E9ABBCAF9.description: Students will know to respect their family and friends.

B4F64A9E576345CF90CDDC78F644F462.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the dignity of the work and the rights of others.

75D8DD0040DB47D6B3E97EFA91CBE5C5.description: Students will know that acts of penance can help us care for the needs of the poor and vulnerable.

F45F936B42EB47DFBF3A9B543A100960.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the preferential option for the poor and vulnerable.

9C6DE6E66C6144F1B48406D5AB5F034E.description: Students will know that stealing is taking the property of another without permission and is against the seventh commandment.

4366D89DBE6549149E0CCD299DD36028.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the rights of all people and their responsibilities towards others.

65EF560BE24D47C6ABF607DB2C8CC83A.description: Students will know to respect their parents, civil authorities, and Church leaders

5A56647B31BF4BBEB710F7F9E551EC61.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the call to family, community and participation in society.

2E2D000E38764F33861C1E6986D2E580.description: Students will know that we should respect all life.

3AE58607382849BA8BA86EF6076B6890.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the life and dignity of the human person.

8F65AA3FE6684D95BF2EF381D23F7F33.description: Students will know how the beatitudes help us to live justly in this world.

7D4B7B81D981431EBCBE1E5D17F1FA5C.description: Students will know that we must share our talents and gifts with others.

6FBA7303604249B98AE114AEE75B55C4.description: Students will grow in their understanding of justice and service.

38D5B5BA77A94C71A6BB96F10F5728F8.description: Students will know that to follow Jesus requires that we learn the ways we should care for others in the world.

AED24E8B5C5A44AA91E4FD012DA96F88.description: Students will grow in their knowledge of Catholic social teaching.

01CE0E93EF0F402489D79AC6CD1D0DDD.description: Students will know the names of the various liturgical ministries.

D44657E7DEA0405EAC38C585A4F58B3D.description: Students will grow in their understanding of participation in the ministry of the Church.

6225D883F29F4A0B8FFDC4F5371D7AF5.description: Students will know about the diocesan and universal Church.

88560A9BB2244CF9BCEDC53A35A1896B.description: Students will grow in their understanding of Church life at parish, diocesan and universal levels.

9E2370C6AD4140A99C826DF5590155EA.description: Students will know that Jesus wants them to always grow in their faith.

F83B64B1F91E4A85B113873EB5C649FB.description: Students will grow in their understanding of participation in life-long faith formation.

EF64F199920F4DA79117DF63420A61A7.description: Students will know that it is wrong to miss Mass on Sunday.

D6250F8B7E0E4E66882B898A19E407CD.description: Students will know that we worship together as Church on Sunday.

7B43F35BC9B64870B21368DD8C4C2DCC.description: Students will grow in their understanding of participation in the liturgical life of the Church.

3B341C2276A94F87970CBE73FB43BF12.description: Students will know we must follow the moral law which urges us to do what is good and avoid what is evil.

4CAF25B083664E3391FB5C258CA98AC3.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Church Law.

56FDF04A381A4CD1A88DF36225441D4C.description: Students will know the meaning of personal and social sin.

3188632134004D1696B5EB1EFE7F89A8.description: Students will know the meaning of venial and mortal sin.

BDBF9E70419E4726BC8BE8A17F6BC3B1.description: Students will know the difference between an ‘accident’ and sin.

E7F9844FA841477798125F236A63437C.description: Students will know the meaning of sin.

D43F5CA346EC45A899F828C5A9C38C0A.description: Students will grow in their understanding of Sin and Forgiveness.

16A639620524461794B3F8D833ACC60B.description: Students will know that our conscience tells us the difference between right and wrong.

5769F4885C454F2EB7048FF837640709.description: Students will know that the Bible and the Church teach us to know what is right and wrong.

91F5622A894E4C61B177043A813E70D0.description: Students will know how to make a good examination of conscience.

7035CDC438CD430D90DCF8298670FFF0.description: Students will know that God has given us free choice which means we can do bad things as well as good.

CD1D02E8A24943AEBAEDFD730AD97143.description: Students will grow in their understanding of Conscience.

F2CCAD3297C24BF89A3DBD2A915F7469.description: Students will know that the Ten Commandments make a good framework for an examination of conscience.

2023E19FAA5F4B39AF6D6B4EF9D26A6C.description: Students will know the Ten Commandments.

4A7B72ACF9674A838F8D7F4AF88589DE.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Commandments.

2A43ECBBC18A4A079B8C6C013E9129D4.description: Students will know that the Beatitudes help us to make a good examination of conscience.

80E5DA8D5FC440FEA7AD99C42D2CD6BC.description: Students will know the great commandment to love God and our neighbor.

4CCB82DAC7B04E31BEA4675EDD61C3FD.description: Students will know the beatitudes and how they are a model for how we live.

898A1233889A4ABCA281C95096298951.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Beatitudes.

E4CE35E9A7F24E3394A3F20E30B759CD.description: Students will know that we must follow the moral law, which urges us to do good.

F8A5D86969E646EBA4182F8699168101.description: Students will know that we show by our actions whether or not we are living according to our life in Christ.

8AF92FED615248379BC231B188F2EA44.description: Students will grow in their understanding of Life in Christ.

0ED96F8781574B85BFAF8D6F0251D6B0.description: Students will know the Our Father, Blessings Before and After Meals, and the Nicene Creed.

0EDE29FF49D34B3B966C610189088F6C.description: Students will know that we should pray in all the events of our lives.

B2607FAD61BD4AE59AACBEB8AC1A9A87.description: Students will know some of the forms of devotional prayer: stations of the cross, novenas, etc.

1E0246E65EFA4CE1B10B6C1D34AA6771.description: Students will know the meaning of devotional prayer.

A89F1F9D34CE49D59A3EDB2D3406BD5B.description: Students will grow in their understanding of prayer.

AC287CBDB66B4EB6A7DBFFA4A52C10B4.description: Students will know the meaning of sacramentals.

9405E8DBDC044496927AD306F11F7464.description: Students will know how to pray Benediction.

61AE4D18A9DE4253B86A1D6362049347.description: Students will know how to pray a Celebration of the Word.

C88D8E3AE2A14EA9BC71D5EE572E4E38.description: Students will know how to pray Morning Prayer.

C6FFCB5104964238B0D2FF484619C917.description: Students will grow in their understanding of other Liturgical celebrations.

6D73DE258CEC41D0AF81CCBF9B33368A.description: Students will know the different traditional symbols of each season.

FC5FBE76977A42CBBFFD12F48521A5DC.description: Students will know the meaning of Lent and the Triduum.

C112D657CC8749899A9291B8CF06C507.description: Students will know that each season celebrates various aspects of the Paschal Mystery.

22E9B972855140EFB0AF8F2C9C777F8E.description: Students will know that the liturgical year has many different seasons.

14F806D22C624AA194A75DE0E93CA92E.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Liturgical Year.

BFE47137DC94470783E98266E24E8F0B.description: Students will know about the sacraments of service: Matrimony and Holy Orders.

539CCE5F91834B00AF98775413F730B9.description: Students will know about the sacraments of healing: Reconciliation and Anointing of the sick.

9AC46DED40784CD0A42E77112903D2A8.description: Students will know that the priest must keep secret all sins confessed to him.

DAE7E42D6E0B4F9FA833071E0FE1D42E.description: Students will know that in the name of Jesus Christ, the priest forgives our sins.

F7965B5D67484733A664BCA343A43488.description: Students will know the meaning of the four major actions of the sacrament of reconciliation: contrition, confession, penance and absolution.

077B9A59AF254A8C9AB8B6ABA98DFCAA.description: Students will know how to participate fully in the Rite of Reconciliation.

DF6D328B9B42494C905CA16637A9A85C.description: Students will know that the sacrament of reconciliation reconciles us to God and the Church.

4919FB6E0CB242658A85E0DA1C817E55.description: Students will know that Baptism makes us members of the Church, forgives sin, and gives us new birth in the Holy Spirit.

6E35CFDC342248D8A6C362337599BE69.description: Students will know the three sacraments of initiation: Baptism, Confirmation and Eucharist.

B4717553FED64190BFEA241850BD927C.description: Students will know that Jesus shares his life with us through the sacraments.

0D818BA3F7DC497390F06DC0CAC34C6F.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Sacraments.

D73D9FCC7706426296DDC2F783F34F21.description: Students will know that sacred space always requires us to act properly in Church.

FF06C84D9F90404197476C537FCBFEF9.description: Students will know that the celebration of the Eucharist is the highest form of worship and is the source of our Catholic identity.

42EECCF4FD534EC2A3735422A13A40E0.description: Students will know that to receive communion we must be free from serious sin and fast from food and drink for one hour.

5960D51D0CFB40008618E7863856E89B.description: Students will know that in the Eucharist we pray that we may also be transformed.

29A5BB24A43A435D8953A61DF9AD1752.description: Students will know that in the Eucharist the bread and wine are changed into the Body and Blood of Christ.

5F03B10752E3400EAE54FE271974991D.description: Students will know the meaning of the parts of the Mass: Introductory Rites, Liturgy of the Word, Liturgy of the Eucharist, and Concluding Rites.

0A1E62CC126641EA89D3C7291B7A64F8.description: Students will know how to participate fully, consciously, and actively at Mass from beginning to end.

A3D5591E933C4FC4B379133E48601A49.description: Students will grow in their understanding of Worship and prayer.

58D7096F69A747188C418A53A6B20082.description: Students will know the names and stories of saints representing different countries.

670EB41254EF429F9A1FCFC62347CB86.description: Students will know that Mary is our mother.

0FC60546190747F096A556C9DC3DBA9B.description: Students will know that the saints are people we can imitate and see as heroes.

596641B3184648D5B19DF45B8BDB2A9C.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Saints.

15EC796E80654FF2A08D8DE24570DF5C.description: Students will know that sin came into the world through the disobedience of Adam and Eve.

1D2058DA58EA48FD901F36DF4DA5BECB.description: Students will know that Adam and Eve disobeyed God.

937E3E3AEA95496E985E4BA3B6752149.description: Students will know that the Bible proclaims the words and deeds of God throughout history.

81276A8D0670480996B7C17F427A4EC2.description: Students will know that the Bible tells us about God’s love for the world.

1BAA7828E47C4667997F1056069DAE63.description: Students will grow in their understanding of Revelation.

7033DF71385A4ECCAD3A4796C7E1CD72.description: Students will know that Mary is the Mother of God and our mother.

176A1B2D52D6453D8961C9F941EC4899.description: Students will know that Jesus came to form a people for himself.

6BDC3ABCA26B46F192D87710B78FFB99.description: Students will know that the Church is the Body of Christ.

A6CC476040EC4D05821861571ECE9117.description: Students will know that the Church is the People of God.

8CA20994EB454AE29F9B9C5239739DB6.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Church.

C662DF43C9004C95BA23FB7F6F3D1D0F.description: Students will know that God has sent the Spirit of his Son into our hearts.

036F41FA321549BD90F3E1FEC18C5C11.description: Students will know that the Holy Spirit teaches us to pray.

37F8A8065A544156B1275BF8B2FEEB97.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Holy Spirit.

38414BC00FB748A794101C8834ECEAC8.description: Students will know that Christ died for our sins.

996EDBA74A554A3EB0C0CB117DEEB01F.description: Students will know that Jesus’ resurrection is the very heart of our faith.

A499866C67504312801AB661A2A2BFE7.description: Students will know the meaning of the word Resurrection.

E01233E18EF14B7895312C570FA9FC25.description: Students will know that Jesus saves us from our sins.

36C2F89F2AC74675ACC6FCA83B248AA3.description: Students will grow in their understanding of God the Son.

1E28F4972ED64CC284CAC4FA4DE920AD.description: Students will know that the Father, who is in heaven, comes lovingly to meet his children and talks with them.

84B37B2FACBD43F9BD6669299FA87035.description: Students will know that God made all creation good.

9C00CA155D514F5BA22FF16E95C37009.description: Students will grow in their understanding of God the Father.

23AE0A6733454D32ABD9528FBB6C6E3B.description: Students will know that God shows himself to us so that we can know and love him.

1B07CC7C0BA04F7A9B60214FCBCB3994.description: Students will know that God speaks to us and tells us about himself.

2A167D04041C41A28470FC6774674E0E.description: Students will know that God is our beginning and our end.

8606216F93D8415382A92FCFBA2AF22E.description: Students will grow in their understanding of the Triune God.
